edge: Alan Silvestri also scored Captain America: The First Avenger, as mentioned by Silvestri himself.
Joss Whedon praised Alan Silvestri's approach to scoring movies, particularly his ability to balance giving each character their due weight and representing the overall entity of 'The Avengers'.
In March 2012, Hollywood Records released the soundtrack concept album inspired by the film, titled Avengers Assemble, on May 1, 2012, coinciding with the release of the score.
